column4: Where is the best place to get help with LDAP. I have slapd and phpldapadmin setup and working.  And I can do an ldapsearch from a remote machine and pull the info from the ldap server. But none of the info is showing up in apple addressbook, outlook, or outlook express.
im impressed youve gotten that far :) update wiki if you have a chance when you get it working
Yeah. the manuals don't really help that much. I had a lot of going back and forth between root user setup in config in phpldapadmin to finally being able to login to it using a user.
